name: Greene and Krantz Complex Analysis Theorem 1.2.3
statement: This is a sample theorem for testing. It contains the inline equation $x^2+y^2=1$ and the block equation $$x,y\in\mathbf{R}$$ with the aligned conclusion\begin{align*}x=&\cos\theta\\\y=&\sin\theta\end{align} for some $\theta\in[0,2\pi)$
